HiddenText.Name: Are personal counseling services available to online students?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Are personal counseling services available to online students?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Counseling Center services are limited, as only full-time day students are eligible.  If the student is not a full-time day student (eg. Online Degree, Off-track, Concurrent, or Continuing Education), please encourage them to search for local resources or contact their ecclesiastical leader. If a student displays suicidal thoughts or attemt, or has a personal safety issue, notify the Online Support Center (OSC) at onlinelearning@byui.edu, 1-866-672-2984, or (208) 496-1800.  Please provide as much information as you can so that the OSC can correctly handle the concern.  Further, dire emergencies can be referred to:(208) 496-9370 or outside M-F 8-5:00, MT: (208) 496-HELP.
